description: SDK for Aviation - Suite of business objects for general aviation and flight procedure design calculations [ ICAO / FAA ] (.NET Standard 2.0) - http://www.fpassistant.com/developer-sdk/
releaseNotes:
- Example Apps in GitHub : https://github.com/FPAssistant/
- Support for SDK basic license to assist in demo GitHub repo
- Internal support for .NET 8
- Easy access to the ICAO API Data Service (requires a license key from ICAO)
- NOTAM support framework added
- Runway with centreline coordinates support added for inclusion with Aerodrome Surface construction (WIP)
- Code Refactoring - ARINC 424 Parser / Support for GML Arcs & Circles from GeoArc and GeoCircle
- Temperature Correction struct added
- ProjectionCoordinate Class to improve Geo calculations
- Code Refactoring / Improved 64-bit Support / ARM64 Support / .NET 5.x Support / Removed NewtonJSON
- Json support for Aviation Objects (Serialize and Deserialize)
- Progress Aerodrome objects added (Runways, Surfaces, FAA Part77/ICAO Annex14 etc)
- ICAO 9905 RNP AR Calculations ( FAP to LTP / VPA Temperature Limits / etc)
- Improvements to Math objects(Vector3d, etc)
- ARINC424 Parser Update 2 - Further development (Development Partners Wanted)
      . Refactoring of ARINC 424 record structs
      . Enroute collection
- GML export helper for GeoMapElements objects
- Improved FAA unit tests and coordinate conversions (WGS-84 <-> UTM)
- Obstacle analysis/assesment classes with support for multi-threading
- Geography support for GeoMapElement (Spatial data)
- Basic ILS geopolyline graphics support
- ICAO Circling Area calculations
- Speed improvments
- Support for KML export of GeoMap elements
- ARINC424 Parser Update 1 - ARINC 424 Record Structs added:
      . Airport – Airport Runway – Airport SID/STAR/Approach  – Airport MSA
      . Heliport – Heliport SID/STAR/Approach – Heliport MSA
      . Waypoints (Enroute & Terminal) – Waypoint Heliport Terminal
      . NDB Navaids (Enroute & Terminal) / VHF Navaid
      . Controlled Airspace / Enroute Airways / Restrictive Airspace
- FAS Data Block Encoding added
- Trial version available upon request
Sample App: https://www.microsoft.com/en-gb/p/fpassistant/9p2l55dqtl55
